question: Which Bollywood personality has been honoured with the 24th Crystal Award at the World Economic Forum (WEF-2018)?
explanation: Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan was honoured with the 24th Crystal Award at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland. He received the award for his leadership in championing children\'s and women\'s rights in India. Shahrukh received the award alongside Elton John and Hollywood actress Cate Blanchett.
